title: Earth's seasons are caused by tilt of Earth

content.question: The primary cause of Earth's seasons is the

choices.label: constant tilt of Earth's rotational axis with respect to the plane of its orbit around the Sun
changing distance of Earth from the Sun at different times of the year
periodic wobbling of Earth on its axis of rotation
changing relative positions of Earth, its Moon, and the Sun
periodic changes in solar energy output

content.answer: constant tilt of Earth's rotational axis with respect to the plane of its orbit around the Sun

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
